mapper.insert:
insert into lineage_table_table(tenant_id,input_table_id,result_table_id,table_lineage_key,is_manual) values
(#{tenantId},#{appType},#{inputTableId},#{resultTableId},#{tableLineageKey},#{isManual})
on duplicate key update gmt_modified=values(gmt_modified)
mapper.delete: update lineage_table_table set is_deleted = 1 where unique_key = #{uniqueKey}
mapper.select: select tt.* from lineage_table_table tt join lineage_table_table_app_ref ref on tt.id = ref.lineage_table_table_id where tt.input_table_id = #{tableId} and ref.app_type = #{appType}
select tt.* from lineage_table_table tt join lineage_table_table_app_ref ref on tt.id = ref.lineage_table_table_id where tt.result_table_id = #{tableId} and ref.app_type = #{appType}
select from lineage_table_table where app_type = #{appType} and table_lineage_key = #{tableLineageKey}
